thread.title: Bethel, Marijane
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Bethel, Marijane

author: Bethel, Marijane
title: Bethel, Marijane
text: For our retirement present we brought in our 3 children and their families for a week in St. Augustine Beach at a house we rented through Vacation Rental Pros. The house, Peace of Paradise, was perfect and gave us the ability to spread out and enjoy the space that was provided. All families had a private bedroom and bathroom. I thought that the town would draw them to explore and visit, however, the pool, the beach and the house kept our group with children aged 2 to 8 busy and engaged. It was a fabulous and memorable time for us and we are contemplating doing it again.
